## NodeAssetContainer.upload() method

Uploads new asset.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
upload(data: Buffer | Readable, options?: UploadAssetOptions): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | <code>Buffer &#124; Readable</code> | Asset data |
|  options | <code>UploadAssetOptions</code> | Upload options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string>`

Asset name
